{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3112152,"name":"Brian Gray","username":"Brian_Gray","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brian_gray/{size}/9971_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-19T20:29:08.154Z","cooked":"

Has anyone found a vendor who sells bumper material in bulk?

I’ve seen all kinds of upholstery and exotic fabrics sold by the bolt, but I can’t seem to find Cordura 1000D in quantities much larger than what is sold by AndyMark or RoboPromo.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-19T20:29:08.154Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":52,"reads":395,"readers_count":394,"score":339.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Brian Gray","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31919,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/1","custom_user_title":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3112160,"name":"Technologyman00","username":"Technologyman00","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/technologyman00/{size}/178178_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-19T20:38:39.993Z","cooked":"
alibaba.com

Waterproof Cordura 1000d Pu Coating Polyester Oxford Tear Wear Resistant...

Waterproof Cordura 1000d Pu Coating Polyester Oxford Tear Wear Resistant Durability Fabric For Outdoor Bag Shose Backpack - Buy Quick Drying Tear Resistance Fabric,Anti-frition High Strength Firmness Fabric,Color Sability Wear Resisting Oxford...

I’ve never purchased from alibaba before so I’m not claiming this is the way to do it. But it looks like they’ll sell you as much as you want

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-19T20:38:39.993Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":389,"readers_count":388,"score":117.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Technologyman00","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.alibaba.com/product-detail/Waterproof-Cordura-1000D-PU-Coating-Polyester_62182557841.html?fromMSite=true","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Waterproof Cordura 1000d Pu Coating Polyester Oxford Tear Wear Resistant Durability Fabric For Outdoor Bag Shose Backpack - Buy Quick Drying Tear Resistance Fabric,Anti-frition High Strength Firmness Fabric,Color Sability Wear Resisting Oxford Product on ","clicks":16}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25951,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"7900, 1792, 1714"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/2","custom_user_title":"7900, 1792, 1714","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112185,"name":"Stewart Riley","username":"Strategic","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/strategic/{size}/10157_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-19T21:12:38.965Z","cooked":"

If what you’re looking for is 1000d Cordura, then one of the best bets as a supplier in bulk is Seattle Fabrics (an outdoor fabrics supplier.) They have what you’re looking for in 60" width, selling by the yard at $17.95/yard. They even have the red and blue colors designated as “FIRST Robotics Red” and “FIRST Robotics Blue”.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-19T21:12:38.965Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":342,"readers_count":341,"score":228.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Stewart Riley","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.seattlefabrics.com/60-1000-D-Cordura-Nylon-1795-linear-yard_p_53.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"1000 Denier Cordura Nylon Fabric By The Yard | Seattle Fabrics","clicks":52}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":13}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32783,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"I plan, therefore I am"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/3","custom_user_title":"I plan, therefore I am","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":10},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":13,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112205,"name":"Paul Eggerding","username":"pdinger4004","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/5f9b8f/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-12-19T22:05:23.427Z","cooked":"

Fields Fabric sells it in person and online. You can buy it by the yard online or call and get the whole bolt.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-19T22:05:23.427Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":309,"readers_count":308,"score":71.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Paul Eggerding","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50615,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4004 Mechanical Mentor and Drive Coach "},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/4","custom_user_title":"4004 Mechanical Mentor and Drive Coach ","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112348,"name":"George C","username":"George_C","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/george_c/{size}/156470_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T04:15:33.226Z","cooked":"

J Ennis Fabrics in Mississauga Ontario carries it. I’ve always bought it by the yard but I’m sure they’d sell you a bolt of it if they have that much. Cordura 1000 – Ennis Fabrics

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T04:15:33.226Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":221,"readers_count":220,"score":44.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"George C","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://ennisfabrics.com/products/cordura-1000?variant=42467221307579","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Cordura 1000 – Ennis Fabrics","clicks":13}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":16588,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112353,"name":"","username":"AaronUp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aaronup/{size}/151708_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T04:28:31.795Z","cooked":"

I have a wholesale account with Ripstopbytheroll and have ordered Cordura from them many times. Their customer service is excellent, pricing is very good on 50 yard bolts, thought it looks like at the moment they’re out of red and blue rolls.

Just curious why you want to order a full bolt? I’ve had luck from other sources- Cordura is odd, it seems like retailers use all different names for the same color. I’ve seen red also called barn red, and mariner blue is also sold as royal blue.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T04:28:31.795Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":206,"readers_count":205,"score":76.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3564,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1768 Drive Coach "},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/6","custom_user_title":"1768 Drive Coach ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112375,"name":"Jeffrey Lewis","username":"jeffreyklewis","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jeffreyklewis/{size}/152765_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T07:01:41.025Z","cooked":"

Bumping this. I’ll also add in the topic of bumper making that Siser Easyweed is just about the best stuff we’ve found for putting numbers on your bumpers and having them still look good at the end of the season. Everything else seems to start peeling off really quickly.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T07:01:41.025Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":177,"readers_count":176,"score":100.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Jeffrey Lewis","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.amazon.com/Siser-EasyWeed-HTV-11-8-Roll/dp/B07D4KKHVD","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":22}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":32783,"username":"Strategic","name":"Stewart Riley","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/strategic/{size}/10157_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":41645,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 696 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/7","custom_user_title":"FRC 696 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112539,"name":"Brian Gray","username":"Brian_Gray","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brian_gray/{size}/9971_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T17:58:53.104Z","cooked":"

I emailed Fields Fabrics and they said not only do they not carry it but they don’t have a supplier for it.

AaronUp:

Just curious why you want to order a full bolt?

Every year we order just enough to make bumpers and I thought it might save us some money to buy it in bulk since it’s something we can always use. Also, it would be nice to have extra just in case someone cuts a piece too short, etc.

jeffreyklewis:

Siser Easyweed is just about the best stuff we’ve found for putting numbers on your bumpers

This is what we have used in the past, but it does peel eventually from what I’ve seen.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T18:06:33.948Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":2,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":143,"readers_count":142,"score":53.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Brian Gray","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":50615,"username":"pdinger4004","name":"Paul Eggerding","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/5f9b8f/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31919,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/8","custom_user_title":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112541,"name":"Jerry Krist - Lead Mentor FRC Team 1792","username":"Emcee_Krizzle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emcee_krizzle/{size}/176234_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T18:11:10.402Z","cooked":"

I have found bumper fabric at Walmart, JoAnn’s Fabric and Hobby Lobby. Easy to find every year.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T18:11:10.402Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":125,"readers_count":124,"score":30.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Jerry Krist - Lead Mentor FRC Team 1792","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":34300,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112544,"name":"Jeffrey Lewis","username":"jeffreyklewis","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jeffreyklewis/{size}/152765_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T18:19:25.742Z","cooked":"

More heat may help you get it to stick better. We ended up buying a heat press a little while back because an iron alone wasn’t quite enough, and our last few years’ bumpers are fine. I had to use some Cricut brand heat set vinyl for a couple numbers this year, though, and they were peeling after a week.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T18:19:25.742Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":119,"readers_count":118,"score":28.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Jeffrey Lewis","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":31919,"username":"Brian_Gray","name":"Brian Gray","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brian_gray/{size}/9971_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":41645,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 696 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/10","custom_user_title":"FRC 696 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112545,"name":"Brian Gray","username":"Brian_Gray","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brian_gray/{size}/9971_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T18:21:38.295Z","cooked":"

I’ll take a second look at those places. In the past I’ve found similar fabrics but the colors weren’t right. Usually they have ripstop nylon that’s closer to the 200D type but much thinner and presumably less durable.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T18:22:01.086Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":117,"readers_count":116,"score":43.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Brian Gray","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":34300,"username":"Emcee_Krizzle","name":"Jerry Krist - Lead Mentor FRC Team 1792","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emcee_krizzle/{size}/176234_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31919,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/11","custom_user_title":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112549,"name":null,"username":"anon91718515","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/97f17d/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T18:40:53.392Z","cooked":"

Regarding the peeling numbers, we use Stahl’s CAD-Cut Premium Plus and a heat press, and our numbers do not peel. I also don’t get too fussed about color, since such a wide variety of “red” and “blue” is acceptable to the inspection team; this opens up many other possible fabric options. You may have a different opinion, and want only the correct red and blue.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T18:41:21.563Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":112,"readers_count":111,"score":52.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.stahls.com/heat-transfer-vinyl-premium-plus","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Premium Plus Heat Transfer Vinyl | Stahls'","clicks":12}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":11148,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112560,"name":"MrBasse","username":"MrBasse","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mrbasse/{size}/65032_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T19:16:13.094Z","cooked":"
Brian_Gray:

This is what we have used in the past, but it does peel eventually from what I’ve seen.

If you apply it properly, the only way it will peel is if you apply heat to break the bond with the fabric. Sounds like you might be light in the pressure of the heat press process if you’ve had it come loose on you. Are you using a press or an iron?

We use a heat press but it might be an issue of pressure. I’ll look into that at bumper time.

","post_number":14,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2022-12-20T19:49:06.193Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":13,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":96,"readers_count":95,"score":34.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":419954,"topic_slug":"bolts-of-bumper-fabric","display_username":"Brian Gray","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":16614,"username":"MrBasse","name":"MrBasse","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mrbasse/{size}/65032_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31919,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult"},"post_url":"/t/bolts-of-bumper-fabric/419954/14","custom_user_title":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3112599,"name":"","username":"AaronUp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aaronup/{size}/151708_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T21:16:13.428Z","cooked":"

Just to note, a bolt of fabric is typically 50 yards, wholesale that’s around $500 and enough for many many years of bumpers.

If youre looking for continuous length quantities, I ordered 10 yards from ebay this year. You may want to verify the color is what you’re looking for, as I said above the name of the color varies from seller to seller. Andymarks pricing is really good for the continuous length, but I found the height produces a lot of waste for our methods and it’s easier to just order yardage. Also a very minor pet peeve- it really should be stored rolled and not folded.

For numbers we’ve used Stahls vinyl. It is a cold peel vinyl, so make sure you read instructions for whatever lettering you’re using.
